A hotfix has been released with the following changes:
[list] [*]Fixed a crash related to a server becoming empty mid-mission. [*]Made changes to addon loading to hopefully address some servers not showing challenges they should have enabled. [*]Marine bots now remember if they were infested or on fire before the bot took over for damage calculations. Removed the restriction on "take a break" while infested. [/list]
Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop Update - June 3, 2023
